title: Know the Cost of Every Call
text: Understand exactly how much each Microsoft Teams meeting costs your business â€” in real dollars.

section.title: How do we do it?
section.content: TeamSpend uses AI to estimate the average pay per hour for each user to determine the cost of their time in a call.

section.title: Save time AND money
section.content: Save your business money and your team time by bringing awareness surrounding the amount time spent in calls.
